name: Handle_rain
xml: <xml xmlns='http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml'><block type='ef_runevery' id='b/Dc(.~,Vp-{|7a~f1-0' x='238' y='88'><field name='seconds'>60</field><statement name='TIME'><block type='controls_forEach' id='V#bbE=662FuodtjbU8_j'><field name='VAR'>shutter</field><value name='LIST'><block type='ef_shutter_list' id='!!DCI]}YT`(k-AFLr;4p'></block></value><statement name='DO'><block type='controls_if' id='qqHZ|d%5b{3%9@AHo)nc'><value name='IF0'><block type='logic_compare' id='[s~W)6Sn4VT~Djt{Z{b!'><field name='OP'>GTE</field><value name='A'><block type='ef_getcaptorvalue' id='ZY:,+uHL[QCo.`qep^3o'><field name='variable'>humidity</field><value name='SHUTTER'><block type='variables_get' id='u[=tdI.PE-fSgW7XC/Hh'><field name='VAR'>shutter</field></block></value></block></value><value name='B'><block type='math_number' id='a72wUN;]X`gf2?[n`0[y'><field name='NUM'>0.8</field></block></value></block></value><statement name='DO0'><block type='ef_close_shutter' id='Gz,f]a5lBgBC}1M:/BbD'><value name='SHUTTER'><block type='variables_get' id='uslt_P.C`)Z[=5}bu@`j'><field name='VAR'>shutter</field></block></value></block></statement></block></statement></block></statement></block></xml>
js: var shutter;Blockly.runEvery(function(60) {   var shutter_list = (EasyFlap.Shutters);  for (var shutter_index in shutter_list) {    shutter = shutter_list[shutter_index];    if ((EasyFlap.getCaptorValue(shutter, "humidity")) >= 0.8) {      EasyFlap.closeShutter(shutter);    }  }});
